dmca.title: FAO George Poletes
dmca.body:
nc

  _____  

From: Henna Boy Sales [mailto:info@henna-boy.co.uk] 
Sent: Wednesday, May 25, 2005 2:39 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: FAO George Poletes



Dear Mr George Poletes

 

I would like to bring to your attention copyright infringements by the
website www.bollyteens.com <http://www.bollyteens.com/> 

 

Mainly the thread http://www.bollyteens.com/Forum/showthread.php?t=7665

 

Throughout the thread there are multiple instances of hotlinked images which
have been used without the consent of myself or my clients.

 

www.hennapage.com <http://www.hennapage.com/> 

www.mehandi.com <http://www.mehandi.com/> 

www.henna-boy.co.uk <http://www.henna-boy.co.uk/> 

 

I have asked that due to the thread containing multiple instances of the
images being hotlinked that the entire thread be removed.

 

I have had no reply.

 

Therefore on behalf of my clients whom I am authorized to represent I would
ask that you contact the owner of the website asking them to fufill my
request and have the entire thread removed. If they do not comply I would
like the Planet to suspend the entire website until they comply.

 

Examples of hotlinked images are as follows

 

http://www.mehandi.com/pixpixie/darla/d2.jpg
<http://www.mehandi.com/pixpixie/darla/d2.jpg%20-%20page%201>    page 1

http://www.hennapage.com/henna/shop/topkapi/tuliphands75.jpg  page 5

http://www.hennapage.com/henna/shop/desai2/2diptipromot.jpg  page 27

http://www.indian-weddings.net/images/Pictures/1182-1.jpg  page 31 - taken
from www.henna-boy.co.uk <http://www.henna-boy.co.uk/>  who authorized
Indian-weddings.net to use the pic.

http://www.indian-weddings.net/images/Pictures/1182-2.jpg  page 31 - as
above.

 

 

Thanks for your assistance.

 

Best Regards

 

 

 



 

Mark Foster
